mapper.insert: insert into g3_product(p_name, p_category, p_option, p_price, p_amount, p_content, p_image, p_thumbimg, p_date,ship_date, p_return_fee) values(#{p_name}, #{p_category}, #{p_option}, #{p_price},#{p_amount}, #{p_content}, #{p_image},#{p_thumbimg}, now(),#{ship_date}, #{p_return_fee})
mapper.select:
select g.p_num,g.p_thumbimg,g.p_name,g.p_category,g.p_price,g.p_amount,g.p_date,c.cate_name,c.cate_code from g3_product g join g3_category c on g.p_category = c.cate_code
WHERE g.p_name LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE g.p_content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE g.p_name LIKE concat('%', #{kesyword}, '%') or g.p_content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by g.p_num desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
